name: 坦克世界：铁甲风暴
description:
There are various cultivation gameplay options in the game, including tank upgrade, accessory upgrade, tank research, renovation, advancement, fleet collection and cultivation. Featuring various PVE gameplay options such as battle levels and endless challenges. Indirect PVP gameplay such as Meritorious Battle and Steel Monster. Strong PVP gameplay such as Qualifying Arena, Cross server Arena, Peak Arena, Multi formation Arena, Hundred server Battle, Zone Tournament, Peak Tournament, etc.
[/h2] Restore the classic replica of the real scenes of World War II [/h2]
Relying on the latest art rendering technology, we realistically recreate World War II tanks. In our own armor tank, every component on the tank is exquisite and meticulous, and the highly flexible component matching system makes every armored tank a representative work of a general.

Arranging troops, creating unique peak strategy battles

The heavy, medium, and light artillery annihilate five types of tanks, perfectly restoring the positioning of tanks on the battlefield, while also making the game's gameplay diverse. There are thousands of great moves to choose from, and with the combination of skills and strategies, the strongest tactical combination can be achieved.

[/h2] Iron armor gathers and ignites again, fingertip smoke and bullets rain [/h2]
The game features almost all well-known tank types in the world, including Cheetah, Honor Tank, T57 Heavy Tank, etc., working with commanders on this scorching battlefield to expand territory and overcome obstacles.

The Legion's fierce battle is imminent

The limited time Legion War takes you back to the era of war, creating your own armored hero, and allowing you to compete against the famous generals of World War II! Guide the battlefield and create the King of Land Warfare.
publishers: 还原真实战场，打造陆地之王
